## FacadeStates type

\*

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FacadeStates<F extends Facade, R extends string> = {
    [K in keyof F]: K extends R ? RouteState<FacadeRoutes<F, R>, F[R]['data']> : F[K]['state'];
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Facade](./react-web.facade.md)<!-- -->, [RouteState](./react-web.routestate.md)<!-- -->, [FacadeRoutes](./react-web.facaderoutes.md)
